types:type.name: jsonmeta
types:type.types:shape: %dw 2.0 type jsonmeta = Array<{| name: String, city: String, age: Number {"typeId": "int"}, profession: String, dob: String |}> {"MetadataFormat": "json", "example": "[{\"name\":\"renju\",\"city\":\"bengaluru\",\"age\":27,\"profession\":\"engineer\",\"dob\":\"18\/05\/1985\"},{\"name\":\"alfred\",\"city\":\"bengaluru\",\"age\":33,\"profession\":\"dreamer\",\"dob\":\"18\/10\/1985\"},{\"name\":\"sam\",\"city\":\"bengaluru\",\"age\":35,\"profession\":\"mediaperson\",\"dob\":\"18\/05\/1985\"}]"}
